trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> 및 <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>네트워크의 가용성이 변경 될 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: NetworkAvailableEventArgs contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAvailableEventArgs는 네트워크 연결의 새 상태를 포함합니다.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref> class.

The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>네트워크의 가용성이 변경 될 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>는 네트워크를 응용 프로그램에 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: 네트워크 응용 프로그램을 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>네트워크의 가용성이 변경 될 때 이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Boolean>는 네트워크를 응용 프로그램에 사용할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는.</xref:System.Boolean>
